jrtr.gldeferredrenderer

Class GBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLBuffer
      • jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GBuffer

  • public class GBuffer
extends GLBuffer
    A GLBuffer which contains 5 textures: - positions - normals - colors - texture coordinates - depth
    Author:
    Heinrich Reich
